data.title: Is Kourtney Still Married to Travis? Who are Kourtney and Travis?
meta_keywords: is kourtney still married to travis
data.meta_description: Yes, Kourtney Kardashian is currently married to Travis Barker. They tied the knot in 2022, marking their union as a significant event in both their personal lives and public attention.
data.text:
Is Kourtney Still Married to Travis?

Yes, Kourtney Kardashian is still married to Travis Barker. They recently celebrated their second wedding anniversary by sharing photos from their wedding in Italy. Kourtney described Travis as the husband of her dreams and expressed her love for him. Travis also commented on her post, calling her his dream wife.

Article continues below advertisement

They had married in Las Vegas right after the Grammy Awards in 2022, followed by a legal ceremony in California. Their wedding in Italy was lavish, attended by their children and close friends. They've continued sharing their love and happiness, making public declarations of their commitment.

https://www.instagram.com/p/C7R0dQWJKM5/

Who is Kourtney Kardashian?

Kourtney Kardashian, born on April 18, 1979, in Los Angeles, is a well-known American media personality and socialite. She gained fame starring in the reality TV series "Keeping Up with the Kardashians," which started in 2007 and ran for 20 seasons. Alongside her sisters Kim and Khloé, Kourtney has ventured into fashion and retail, launching clothing lines and fragrances. She also created a lifestyle website named Poosh in 2019.

Article continues below advertisement

Article continues below advertisement

TRENDING

Kourtney grew up in a high-profile family, with her father being Robert Kardashian and her mother Kris Jenner (now Caitlyn Jenner). She attended Marymount High School in Los Angeles and later studied at the University of Arizona, where she earned a degree in Theatre Arts. Kourtney is active on social media, where she promotes various products and brands. Her influence extends beyond television, making her a significant figure in popular culture.

https://www.instagram.com/p/C7zOfENJlWL/

Kourtney Kardashian Career

2005-2010: Career Beginnings and International Recognition

Appeared on "Filthy Rich: Cattle Drive" in 2005, raising money for charity.

Gain prominence due to her sister Kim's leaked sex tape in 2007.

"Keeping Up with the Kardashians" premiered in October 2007, becoming a hit.

Launched spin-offs like "Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami" in 2009.

Co-owned clothing boutiques D-A-S-H in multiple cities.

Released a clothing line for Bebe and created a sunless tanner, Kardashian Glamour Tan.

Co-authored the book "Kardashian Konfidential" in 2010.

2011-2018: Television and Other Ventures

Starred in "Kourtney and Kim Take New York" from 2011 onwards.

Made acting debut on "One Life to Live" in 2011.

Released a novel, "Dollhouse," with her sisters in 2011.

Endorsed diet supplement Quick Trim, facing legal issues in 2012.

Launched jewelry collection for Virgins, Saints, and Angels in 2010.

Featured in spin-off "Kourtney & Khloé Take the Hamptons" in 2014.

Launched solo fashion line with PrettyLittleThing in 2017.

Collaborated with Calvin Klein and Kylie Cosmetics in 2018.

2019-Present: Business and Continued Television Success

Founded lifestyle website Poosh in March 2019.

Partnered on perfumes under KKW Fragrance in November 2019.

"Keeping Up With the Kardashians" concluded in 2021 after 20 seasons.

Launched health brand Lemme in September 2022.

Returned to television with "The Kardashians" on Hulu in April 2022.

Renewed for multiple seasons, continuing into 2023.

This timeline highlights Kourtney Kardashian's evolution from reality TV star to entrepreneur and businesswoman, spanning over two decades of media and business ventures.

Article continues below advertisement

Article continues below advertisement

Kourtney Kardashian Age

Kourtney Kardashian, born on April 18, 1979, in Los Angeles, California, is currently 45 years old. Known for her role in reality TV and as a socialite, she gained fame through shows like "Keeping Up with the Kardashians." She studied at the University of Arizona, earning a degree in Theatre Arts. Kourtney has been active in media since 2005 and continues to be a prominent figure in entertainment. She married Travis Barker in 2022 and has four children.

Article continues below advertisement

Article continues below advertisement

Who is Travis Barker?

Travis Landon Barker, born on November 14, 1975, in Fontana, California, is an accomplished American musician known primarily as the drummer for the rock band Blink-182. His musical journey began at a young age, and he gained prominence after joining Blink-182 in 1998, contributing to their mainstream success with hit albums like "Enema of the State" (1999).

Article continues below advertisement

Article continues below advertisement

Barker's drumming style is versatile, blending influences from punk rock, hip-hop, and alternative music genres.Beyond Blink-182, Barker has collaborated with various artists and bands, including his rap rock group Transplants and the rock band +44. He's also ventured into solo projects and DJ collaborations.

Travis Barker is recognized not only for his musical talents but also for his entrepreneurial spirit, having founded clothing lines and record labels. He's authored a memoir, "Can I Say," detailing his life and career in the music industry. Barker remains a significant figure in contemporary music, known for his innovative drumming techniques and wide-ranging musical contributions.

Article continues below advertisement

Article continues below advertisement

https://www.instagram.com/p/C9LIdxuycQ3/

Travis Barker Career

1993-1998: Musical Beginnings

Worked as a trash man in Laguna Beach.

Played with bands like Snot and Feeble.

Joined ska punk band the Aquabats in 1994.

Recorded "The Fury of the Aquabats!" in 1997.

Joined Blink-182 in 1998 after filling in for their drummer.

1999-2004: Mainstream Success

Released "Enema of the State" with Blink-182 in 1999.

Band became a pop punk sensation.

Released hits like "All the Small Things."

Formed Famous Stars and Straps retail store.

Married and divorced Melissa Kennedy.

Released "Take Off Your Pants and Jacket" in 2001.

Formed +44 with Mark Hoppus in 2005.

2005-2008: Reality TV and Collaborations

Starred in MTV reality show "Meet the Barkers."

Released albums with +44 and the Transplants.

Began collaborations with hip-hop artists.

Survived a serious plane crash in 2008.

2009-Present: Solo Projects and Reunions

Reunited with Blink-182 in 2009.

Released solo album "Give the Drummer Some" in 2011.

Continued collaborations with various artists.

Produced albums and appeared in documentaries.

Founded DTA Records and Barker Wellness.

2021-2023: Recent Projects

Released a solo album "Coup de Grâce" in 2024.

Continued collaborations and label activities.

Signed publishing deal with Warner Chappell Music.

Explored new projects in music and wellness products.

This timeline highlights Travis Barker's journey from his early days in music to his current endeavors in the industry.

Travis Barker Age

Travis Barker, born on November 14, 1975, is currently 48 years old. He hails from Fontana, California, USA. Known for his roles as a musician, songwriter, and record producer, Barker has been active in the music industry since 1993. Over the years, he has gained fame for his work with bands like Blink-182 and as a solo artist. His versatility and innovative drumming style have made him a prominent figure in rock and pop-punk music
